title: Remove a File from the Last Commit
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to remove a file from the last commit in a Git repository without changing the commit message.

meta.title: Git Tutorials | Version Control System Mastery
meta.description: Learn how to remove a file from the last commit in Git, a powerful version control system used by developers to track changes in their codebase.
meta.keywords: Git, version control, code repository, commit management, file removal

steps.title: Remove a File from the Last Commit

verify.name: Verify for successful removal
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 从最后一次提交中移除文件
i18n.description: 在本次挑战中，你将学习如何在不更改提交消息的情况下，从 Git 仓库的最后一次提交中移除文件。

meta.title: Git 教程 | 精通版本控制系统
meta.description: 学习如何在 Git 中从最后一次提交中移除文件，Git 是开发者用于跟踪其代码库更改的强大版本控制系统。
meta.keywords: Git、版本控制、代码仓库、提交管理、文件移除

steps.title: 从最后一次提交中移除文件

verify.name: 验证是否成功移除
